Articles.Content:
I remeber a video, the user had a completely different space ship parts then what is default.

He mentioned it was available among people who made the plug ins and such, possibly 3rd party or individual collabration.

i\'m Just starting to ponder how to do this with the default sets.

What can i do to modify the parts and scripts whatever, to do certain things to complete this task.

Simply put an object in space. maintain orbit. Pending circumstances. I want to see how space magenetisim etc effect an object over time. And somehow refine prediction of it\'s landing, or orbiting. On it\'s own.

Maybe i\'ll post various results...via screen shots. My pc sux. Single core 2ghz with 2 quadro 500\'s sli is dell disabled =c

I\'ve already established the limits of my threshold, by orbiting around the kerbal solar system i came from.
